summary: The Michelin Guides are a popular series of travel and restaurant guides started in 1900 by the French tire company Michelin. These guides rate restaurants with up to three stars for exceptional quality. They also publish the Green Guides, which offer general travel information about various destinations. The Michelin Guides are trusted resources for food enthusiasts and travelers, helping them discover the best culinary experiences and explore new places.
title: Michelin Guide
